NightStrike::

"it would be easy"said the male"we just watch BlackNightmare, they 
don't go so far of her"


BlackNightmare


"We should go fast and thing something"said the femme to all minions 
poresents"they must know by now what're we planning"

ran

> "We'll need these.  Our bodies won't handle space very well, just 
> long enough to re enter the atmosphere."
> The Hunter Killer and his clone put the masks on and both jumped 
out 
> the air lock and waited outside with Blacknightmare.  Necross and 
> Splattercannon slowly followed, hanging back with Nightstrike.
> "Do not take your optics off of those two," Necross told 
> Nightstrike," they can't be trusted.  They may try something."
